channel.title: Luzox new server reopened
channel.description:
luzox 718/742 Hey guys and welcom to the awsome Server called luzox-pvp. We hope this is enough to show you to join ofcource there is much more like minigames, bossing, skilling and many more but you have to come online to see it. The server has staff that listens to youré ideas and mostly all of the time add it in game.
Epic Looking Forums
[url=http://luzox-pvp.ipbhost.com/]Invision Power Board[/url]
Download link
[url=http://up.ht/13eFAXK/]Client Download[/url]
Or simply just donload it on the forums
Videos from version 1 to 4
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bhF7K2fPCBg/]Player Vid[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jlRJElDeT04/]Player Vid[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q4NAv3IhR7U/]Player Vid[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tUvj54lIZNE/]Player Vid[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l73rnBcSF3c/]Player Vid[/url]
Information:
all working auras including supreme's eco base eco pricing flaming skulls specs for all items the should have Squeal of fortune Owners which care about every single Player and listen to them.
Features: - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Grandpa Jack - Storm of Armadyl,- Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour doesn't Degrade - Auras are all complete - possible to Switch ingame name - every single skill works
Bosses: - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - 100% Godwars with new drops - Corporeal beast with all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows
Pvp/PK/PVM - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Very good switching - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Awsome home:
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/1b76061eb29bb8d418863655184c37eb.png[/img]
clue scrolls with everything like real rs:
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/3ffb4160a664dbc551c7ff67f4796b2a.png[/img]
Fight Kiln with all Waves:
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/1e7c843c0ee680c454ea1a4cfcb70379.png[/img]
Nex wth all 4 waves:
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/07a0f2bb44167f434ac7eb26388ecd6a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/908f9400d253d043a23fd4964077e240.png[/img] -- dung
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/147c8b6ebfd622bd40f3335e0f61acfb.png[/img] -- donor
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/5080aba0947c7a104c490b0410fbd997.png[/img] -- donor zone
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/f6f91a0560c00199d8529d9611d9e637.png[/img] -- Lava Mining
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/bdc52445992fbc1c1390eb4199cf713f.png[/img] -- Thiev
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/0e9d6820a0e108af9ded3eaadfdf7aaa.png[/img] -- Smithing
We Need as many Players as we can get so pls try it out at :
[url=http://luzox-pvp.ipbhost.com/]Invision Power Board[/url]

item.title: Luzox new server reopened
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Looks like any other 718, good luck anyway.

Read full topic
